div.div:
Joseph - December 30, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.4
Worth every penny
Of all the apps I've ever downloaded this is the only one that continues to stay on my device. It has never failed me and doesn't even ask for permissions. It just works and has all the features I would ever ask for.

Thomas-n-Denise - February 5, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.4
Best one
I've used this everyday now for the past 6 months and it has never failed me. LOVE IT! -DROID X & RAZR MAXX

Chuck - January 1, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.4
I love this app!
I have set up eight or so alarms. Most days I don't use any, but for those "can't be late" events, I can quickly activate AlarmDroid. Highly recommended!

Phuong - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
Works really well on galaxy s
I love the shake to turn off and flip to snooze feature, the weather update and custom wake up message. Highly recommended.

Brian - December 29, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.4
Great way to wake up but
Good Morning will work better for me with the full screen snooze button and 2nd stop/snooze countdown screen than Alarm Droid with snooze and stop buttons on same screen.

BLADESMAN1889 - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
The BEST alarm clock by a mile. 5* All day long !
ICS Bug (turning alarm off put phone into Silent/Vibrate mode) seems to have 'gone away/been fixed' now - without any feedback from Dev whom I contacted several times via email & website (netpurist)

February 28, 2012 - Motorola Droid with version 1.4
Well worth pro jst to not see ads. Nice alarm works for me. Hardly ...
Well worth pro jst to not see ads. Nice alarm works for me. Hardly ever late. Choose mp3: )

Mary - June 8, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.4
Sorry
Today marks the 3rd time this alarm didn't go off on a work day! Wanted to like it but unreliable!!!! Uninstalling! Samsung Infuse

Azfar - June 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
Best Alarm app in Market
I love the new layout. Something new to get used to but looks sharp and beautifull.

June 19, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.4
Pay the man!
After using the free version I felt like my most reliable app should cost something. Thank you goes out to the programmer for offering such a great app for free.

Russ - June 4, 2012 - Version 1.4
Crap
Was decent until they added ads in pro version, now in order to remove adds from payed version you need to send him more money via donate button and you will get a new code to disabled the new ads

R - April 8, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.4
This is THE alarm clock to have
Been using free version on tablet for over 6 months with almozt no trouble (small glitch with the solve arithmetic problem feature self activating & not wanting to shut off when solved but self corrected next alarm cycle a couple times). Makes a plug in clock look like a unicycle compared to a car! Pay for this program, it's inexpensive at 10 times the price & worth every penny!

Alex - February 8, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.4
Actually does what I want
I tried several alarm apps and hated them all. Thus one, however, is awesome.

Dr. Hellen Lecter - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
Brilliant
Great app, the only thing that would make it better for me is the option to start using obstacles only after snoozing for x minutes/times, that's nitpicking tho, I can accomplish this by setting up two alarms.

Brodie - May 1, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.4
Great, but...
Global weather format option for fahrenheit vs celsius doesn't update scripts for voice alarms. Also, would be neat to see widget switch for individual alarms. Really very brilliant app for the sleeper who needs their awakening to be "just so."

Nicole - January 7, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.4
Nice work.
Realised this has been getting me up without fail every day for two years, so I donated.

Andreas - June 4, 2012 - Version 1.4
Awesome!
Many options, very reliable, definitely worth buying.

Thomas - May 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4
Big fat bug
Crashes when selecting an mp3 as ring tone. Please fix! Other than that simply the best alarm available!

bin - April 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
Good stuff
Keep it up! Excellent useful and fun affiliations this guy develops.

MURDER 1 - March 21, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.4
LG G2X
THIS APP IS THE BEST APP IN THE MARKET HANDS DOWN. YOU SHOULD REALLY CHECK OUT THE CLOCK AND WEATHRR REPORTER WHICH IS FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE TO SAY WHAT YOU WANT IT TO SAY. GREAT APP.

Ian - June 16, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.4
Love this alarm so much I bought it...
Decided to show some support. Would like to know why the adware doesn't uninstall ...

juergen - May 14, 2012 - Version 1.4
Perfect
Using this tool for several monts now. There's no better alarm clock tool in play store. SGS2 ICS

sarah - January 12, 2012 - ZTE Blade with version 1.4
Excellent
Used this for a few weeks now, easy to use & reliable. Thanks to the countdown alarm, the dinner has not been burned or the kids forgotten to b picked up once. Essential :-)

Joseph - April 25, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.4
Verizon Thunderbolt
Love the Pro app! Without it, I would never show up for work. I used ro have 4 different alarms set in my bedroom. Now? Only the one on my phone! Very happy.

decadent - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
Great app
Works beyer than other alarm apps I've tried.

Mark - May 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
Great
Super! It has great options and works perfectly on my HTC Aria & SGS2 THANK YOU!

Stanislav - February 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
10x
It always does the job... When early in the morning.

James - March 19, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.4
Great alarm app
My favorite alarm application. Been using it for a while. Gladly buying the pro version to help support this dev.

Marios - April 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
The free version is adequate for me but I wanted to support the developer ...
The free version is adequate for me but I wanted to support the developer of this amazing alarm clock I've been using for months.

Miroslav - January 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
Donated
to support great app. Worth every cent :-)

Derek - February 24, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.4
Great alarm clock!
My favorite AC on the market. Like it so much donated.

Joshua - December 31, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.4
Worth every penny
I use this app every day and it's exactly what I want!

Neeraj - June 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4
Worth.
Finally got rid of the annoyance. Thanks.

MmMerrifield - December 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.4
No ads!
Seems to work just fine on my epic 4g

Chip - February 10, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.4
Design could be better.
Have to swipe and unlock phone to get to alarm to snooze or turn off. If this could be changed then I would definitely rate it higher.

Helmut - January 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
Does what it is supposed to do and more
Try it! You will love it!

Anders - June 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.4
Perfect
Very nice app...it's a must have!

johannes petrus - June 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.4
Alarm
Awesome

tobias.koeck - June 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4
Didnt remove adds

Roald - June 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.4
Great app
Great interface, lots of good options.

Misako - December 31, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.4
Great app! !
I cannot live without it!

Reda - March 15, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.4
Ben
Luv this app

Neill - December 31, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.4
Awesome alarm app

Lor, or Tigger - December 31, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.4
Worth
The money

Chris - July 2, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.4
Best alarm!
Great!

Scott - November 17, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2
Outstanding
I have gone through so many alarm apps to finally find the perfect one and this is it. Great job!

Laurie - October 20, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2
I adored alarmdroid so I purchased pro. If it would let me open the ...
I adored alarmdroid so I purchased pro. If it would let me open the installed app it would probably be fantastic. The free version is unbeatable!

Julien - December 24, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.2
Perfect
Good practical interface and easy navigation. Use it daily, has always worked without a hitch. Highly recommended.

J - February 13, 2011 - Version 1.2
I love it! The best alarm clock out there! I was happy to buy ...
I love it! The best alarm clock out there! I was happy to buy the pro version.

Klaus - September 26, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Very happy!
Excellent program, am using it every day ;-) Well worth supporting the author - even (especially) if there's a free version.

n2 - October 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2
Best alarm clock!
I use this every day. It's reliable, easy to use, and full-featured. I really like the widget that gives a countdown til next alarm. Well worth a buy.

Amanda - September 25, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.2
My favorite alarm!
Fabulous app! Is one of the few that I always put on my phone and bought the pro version for!

Donovan - October 27, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.2
Excellent
Tried most big name alarm clocks. On the market. This made sense after few mins. Used for a week several times and never failed.

JosB - July 24, 2011 - Version 1.2
Almost perfect, can the widget be configured to enable a default alarm in one ...
Almost perfect, can the widget be configured to enable a default alarm in one click?

mycelo - September 21, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.2
That's now my official alarm. Everything you could need with a simple, neat and ...
That's now my official alarm. Everything you could need with a simple, neat and straightforward app. Buy it.

Helga - October 9, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.2
.
Nice interface. But if I go to sleep & leave headphones in I can't hear alarm. Sound only comes through h/phones & not speakers. Atrix.

Mário - October 15, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2
Highly configurable.
It let's you customize everything about the alarm: volume (increasing), timing, recurring, retiring, snooze, voice. Only problem? Ugly GUI.

Brian - November 7, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Five Stars!
Used for parking, morning wake-up, reminder for eBay auctions. Great app!

Soyer Pan - August 19, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2
Worth two bucks.
The free version is good because of the thought and programming the author has invested on the app. I want for him to continue. You all should do too.

David - March 18, 2011 - HTC Incredible S with version 1.2
Excellent product AND support
Very happy with this product. I am using it with a Zedge ringtone and asked the developer if we could have a date-settable alarm for any time in the future. I could not find any other Market App with this feature even though my Nokias have it and also Palms, Blackberries etc. The developer was extremely responsive and the feature is now in the latest Beta released today. Great product and great support.

Billy - July 26, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 1.2
The best alarm app out there hands down! Never had a problem since i ...
The best alarm app out there hands down! Never had a problem since i installed 9 months ago

indreamer - April 19, 2011 - Version 1.2
the best alarm on the market
Simply the best alarm on the market. Very handy and useful. Especially love the "turn the phone" feature)

who - September 11, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2
Awesome!
Bought the paid version just to say thanks for such an awesome app. Good job!

Toes_NZ - September 17, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.2
Fantastic Application, It's On My A List!
I've been using this application for a couple of months now, It's never let me down and has more sensible features than any other alarm clock i've ever used spanning many years of different mobile operating systems. Well done.

Pamela - June 24, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2
This works great, thanks Fabian. I use it with Rings Extended to play Reveille. ...
This works great, thanks Fabian. I use it with Rings Extended to play Reveille. Wakes me up every time!

pestfkr - May 15, 2011 - Version 1.2
Missing pro functionality
Nice app but can't find the promised paid extra features, widget and night clock.

Emma - July 15, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2
Love this! Just be sure to have the free one downloaded too... This just ...
Love this! Just be sure to have the free one downloaded too... This just removes the ads. But well worth the money!

Fred - September 17, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.2
Alarm Droid rocks!
Awesome. Best one I've used.

mizch - February 16, 2011 - Version 1.2
Best alarm app
For me the best alarm app. I prefer it over 'Gentle Alarm' because of its options. (It's a pity that so few users support the developer.)

Nir - August 12, 2011 - Version 1.2
The free app is so good, I just had to show my appreciation by ...
The free app is so good, I just had to show my appreciation by buying the pro. Good job man.

GD - July 11, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.2
Downloaded this and its not in my list of apps at all. Got refunded ...
Downloaded this and its not in my list of apps at all. Got refunded and tried again but the same - this hasn't installed to my phone after it says so

Laurie - July 28, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.2
Fantastic app! Been using the free version for about a month; love the ...
Fantastic app! Been using the free version for about a month; love the personalization of alarms. Purchased the Pro version to support the developer.

Chris - April 2, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.2
Second try at buying. My bank is being retarded. This combined with sense analog ...
Second try at buying. My bank is being retarded. This combined with sense analog clock is the best apps on the market. Well worth the money!

Jonathan - May 27, 2011 - Dell Streak 7 with version 1.2
Like this app, nice alarm clock addition to android system. Note: you MUST have ...
Like this app, nice alarm clock addition to android system. Note: you MUST have the free version of AlarmDroid installed in order for this to work.

Justin - March 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Best alarm app on Android....Period! Many features and it works every time.

Stefanie - May 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Would work for a few days but then goes silent. I cannot trust this ...
Would work for a few days but then goes silent. I cannot trust this app anymore. :( It used to work great a few updates ago.

Skawn - November 10, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2
Gets me up on time...
My only wish is that it had an activate all alarms button so i don't have to manually do them all.

Theo - July 30, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2
Would love integration with nfc task launcher or tasker in the pro version! Geeky ...
Would love integration with nfc task launcher or tasker in the pro version! Geeky nexus s user with dreams of nfc confirmed morning alarms!

Eduardo - February 11, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2
I was disappointed with previous update, but there was no issue. However dev proved ...
I was disappointed with previous update, but there was no issue. However dev proved very responsive to just comments!! Best app ;)

Maria - August 5, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.2
Used the free version, really liked it, paid for pro version to support. Maria

o1 - February 14, 2011 - Samsung VinsQ(M910) with version 1.2
Purchased to support dev. Please fix notifications and start up with phone ...
Purchased to support dev. Please fix notifications and start up with phone problems.

andrew - August 26, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Play with version 1.2
Alarmdroid
Brilliant please support the pro version if use and like this app

carol - September 30, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2
Love it
Couldn't get up without it.

Sarah - April 28, 2011 - HTC Hero with version 1.2
I can't get it to open, it says installed but won't open, help!

VulturEMaN - October 11, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2
works
I get up for work!

Niall - February 24, 2011 - Version 1.2
I love AlarmDroid but there are no extra features with this installed? Refunded for ...
I love AlarmDroid but there are no extra features with this installed? Refunded for now as it said there was a widget and night clock included.

Amanda - February 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Best Alarm app by far!

Larrry404 - June 21, 2011 - Version 1.2
Can't install and I bought it twice. Should have used the free version,But hate ...
Can't install and I bought it twice. Should have used the free version,But hate ads

February 11, 2011 - Version 1.2
I bought this app and it said it installed, but it never showed up ...
I bought this app and it said it installed, but it never showed up in my apps. That is ridiculous. Why can't they still show the free version on here?

Rob - April 11, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.2
Fantastic app with lots of customization and multiple alarm options.

Jon - May 13, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2
Great alarm app. Make sure you have the free version installed first since this ...
Great alarm app. Make sure you have the free version installed first since this is just a festure unlocker

Gary - February 12, 2011 - Version 1.2
Well worth €1.49! Best alarm clock for any mobile device!

Pamala - March 29, 2011 - Version 1.2
Absolute best alarm on the market! So many ways to customize it! I love ...
Absolute best alarm on the market! So many ways to customize it! I love the playlist option!

Les - March 26, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.2
Excellent piece of work!

Anthony - September 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2
Sprint epic 4g
Is there anyway for my to plug my phone into a audio jack(my lil stereo in my room) and listen to my alarm??!!! Been tryin for days!

Danielle - December 11, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.2
I use this daily. No problems at all.

Jeremy - April 30, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2
People don't seem to understand that this is an "unlocker" for the free version. ...
People don't seem to understand that this is an "unlocker" for the free version. You must install free version then use this.

Matthew - February 23, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2
No widget and night clock as mentioned in free version?

JAN JESUS - April 5, 2011 - Version 1.2
Perfect! I love this alarm clock!

Antoine - March 25, 2011 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 1.2
It runs just like it says

scrillahands - April 25, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2
Hands down best alarm app I've used. Thanks dev! Desire hd

Kyle - October 26, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.2
Excellent alarm clock app

Double S - April 24, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2
Will not work on droid x!!!

navi - November 3, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2
Just a super app

joseph - February 23, 2011 - HTC Aria with version 1.2
no good

John - November 30, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.2
JBW
Fantastic application works perfectly

Graham - November 8, 2010 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.0
Excellent fully featured alarm clock app. Friendly and responsive developer. ...
Excellent fully featured alarm clock app. Friendly and responsive developer. Glad to pay for this app

Trigger - November 9, 2010 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.0
I use this every day. Flip-to-snooze is awesome along with the gentle wake up. ...
I use this every day. Flip-to-snooze is awesome along with the gentle wake up. I gladly paid for it.

Nikolas - December 13, 2010 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0
This app is the off the chain.. Loves it.. All of my friends gag ...
This app is the off the chain.. Loves it.. All of my friends gag when ever they hear it tell the time, temps and most importantly time to get up..

Andy - May 15, 2012 - HTC EVO Shift 4G
Disappointed
My alarms constantly disappear with no discernable rhythm or reason. No contact back from the developer after several emails. I even purchased the "pro" version thinking it may be better. Shame on me I suppose. Thanks for nothing Fabian.

beauxjames - June 8, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D
Bought it!
Great stuff...came over from your free version...thanks for the support and time!

Mihai - February 21, 2012 - HTC Wildfire S
.....
ok good
